div.p: The Benjamin Banneker Preparatory Charter School strives to remain in compliance with all NJ Statutes and Administrative Codes. It is our duty to keep parents informed of all Board adopted policies and regulations. Please go to the ABOUT US tab and scroll down to HIB to view our HIB policy, regulation, and grade reports.
